languages.text: The future was foreseen for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}: this creature's next attack must succeed, and the next attack against it must miss. The creature's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} increases by +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>%.
languages.original_text: Предвидение будущего на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}: следующая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} этого существа попадет в цель, а атака, направленная в него, промахнется.
